snippet: The luxury GTs may lose function of their taillights, including brake lights, Maserati told the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration on Thursday.
abstract: The luxury GTs may lose function of their taillights, including brake lights, Maserati told the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Maserati is recalling almost 1,800 of its 2008-10 GranTurismo coupes and convertibles for what it calls a "deviation" in the manufacture of taillight assemblies. The assemblies' bulbs, including those in the brake lights, may fail, the automaker informed the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration on Thursday.

headline.main: Maserati Recalls Nearly 1,800 GranTurismos for Possible Brake-Light Failure
